title: I forgot my e-mail....
body: So i forgot my e-mail so i cant change my password...I Think that someone's in my acc and he plays...And i wanna to ask you if u can help me to recover it.It was something like babatiepedal123 or babapedal123 or 123babatiepedal...Something like theese... Please help me  !!!

replies.body: Anytime you're having problems with remembering account information or think someone might have found their way into your account, it'd be best to reach out to the account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can! After verifying yourself as the account creator they'll be able to help you secure your account again.
